1.0.0.name: wordpress/genesis-sticky-menu
1.0.0.description:
This plugin adds a sticky menu. When you scroll down, the sticky menu will appear at the top. Now scroll back to the top of the page, and you’ll see the sticky menu disappear. This plugin will create Third menu location named "Genesis Sticky menu". Select your menu on this location. You can choose Background color, Background hover color, Text color and Text hover color

Requires the Genesis framework.

Check plugin demo here

I really thank Logeshkumar for his cooperation.
